title: The only creep we haven't really seen in this game is Evasion creep
body: If you think about it, Jax is the only champion since earlier season with an evasion ability that lets him attack when dodging AA. Yes, there's been an increase in untargetable/invulnerable skills, but none as unique as Jax's E. I wonder if Riot would start giving new champs counterstrike mechanics in the future.
